name: The Cad and the Hat
writer: Matt Groening (created by), James L. Brooks (developed by), Matt Groening (developed by), Sam Simon (developed by), Ron Zimmerman, Tom Root, Mike B. Anderson (story concept by: Robot Chicken Couch Gag 2)
actors: Dan Castellaneta, Julie Kavner, Nancy Cartwright, Yeardley Smith
plot: Bart deals with his guilt of betraying Lisa; Homer is revealed to be a master chess player.
